变革性的 800 万美元捐款推动了 WEHI 的胰腺癌研究 非凡的 800 万美元，10...一项为期 10 年的 800 万美元慈善投资将引领胰腺癌的新疗法，并在 WEHI 创建一个新的专门研究中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Transformative-248-million-donation-fuels-pancreatic-cancer-research-at-WEHI-An-Exceptional-248-Million-10.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Transformative-248-million-donation-fuels-pancreatic-cancer-research-at-WEHI-An-Exceptional-248-Million-10.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfc57d61-af44-4b19-bd4c-5a0681c50ae4 Tue, 21 May 2024 12:12:22 -0400 Transformative $8 million donation fuels pancreatic cancer research at WEHI An Exceptional $8 Million, 10...
创新钙钛矿 X 射线探测器增强医学成像能力中国科学院技术研究所（SIAT）与华中师范大学的研究人员合作，开发了一种用于医学成像的高性能钙钛矿X射线互补金属氧化物半导体（CMOS）探测器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Innovative-perovskite-X-ray- detector-enhances-medical-imaging-capability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Innovative-perovskite-X-ray- detector-enhances-medical-imaging-capability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ed5163a-9fbf-4251-9bf1-49db60c46690 Tue, 21 May 2024 11:59:53 -0400 Innovative perovskite X-ray detector enhances medical imaging capabilities
音乐疗法能否改善早产儿 24 个月的语言发育？父母主导、婴儿主导的唱歌对 24 个月时语言发展的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Can-music-therapy-improve-language-development-in-preterm-children-by-24-months.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Can-music-therapy-improve-language-development-in-preterm-children-by-24-months.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96d89236-e135-4924-9bd4-2c559b39b858 Tue, 21 May 2024 07:17:00 -0400 Can music therapy improve language development in preterm children by 24 months?
流行糖尿病药物价格高昂导致低收入人群无法获得有效治疗在过去的一年半里，坦德拉·库珀·哈里斯 (Tandra Cooper Harris) 和她的丈夫马库斯 (Marcus) 都患有糖尿病，他们一直在努力按处方购买控制血糖所需的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/High-price-of-popular-diabetes-drugs-deprives-low-venue-people-of- effective-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/High-price-of-popular-diabetes-drugs-deprives-low-venue-people-of- effective-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a556d06-7f8b-44ec-80a5-dd733e8b0e95 Tue, 21 May 2024 07:06:55 -0400 High price of popular diabetes drugs deprives low-income people of effective treatment
拜登倾向于医疗保健，要求选民信任他而不是特朗普为了获得对 14 年前他帮助通过的全面健康法的大力支持，乔·拜登总统最新的连任策略之一就是提醒选民，前总统唐纳德·特朗普试图废除《平价医疗法案》。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Biden-leans-into-health-care-asking-voters-to-trust-him-over-Trump.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Biden-leans-into-health-care-asking-voters-to-trust-him-over-Trump.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=600e90ca-f6a8-4767-9d3d-48610a6091e0 Tue, 21 May 2024 07:05:14 -0400 Biden leans into health care, asking voters to trust him over Trump
由教练支持的移动健康干预措施可以降低痴呆症风险吗？教练支持的移动健康干预措施是否可以减少高风险、服务不足人群的痴呆症危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Can-a-coach-supported-mobile-health-intervention-reduce-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Can-a-coach-supported-mobile-health-intervention-reduce-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51940417-3437-4d16-838b-65f630d4f8fb Tue, 21 May 2024 05:56:00 -0400 Can a coach-supported mobile health intervention reduce dementia risk?
ERS Genomics 与 IRBM 签署 CRISPR/Cas9 许可协议CRISPR 许可公司 ERS ​​Genomics Limited (“ERS”) 和药物发现领域的领导者 IRBM 今天宣布签署非独家 CRISPR/Cas9 许可协议。该协议授予 IRBM 访问 ERS ​​的 CRISPR/Cas9 专利组合的权限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/ERS-Genomics-and-IRBM-sign-CRISPRCas9-license-agreement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/ERS-Genomics-and-IRBM-sign-CRISPRCas9-license-agreement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=839d58f0-af3e-4a2a-80b4-d42db55000be Tue, 21 May 2024 01:03:00 -0400 ERS Genomics and IRBM sign CRISPR/Cas9 license agreement
Hamilton 推出下一代排气移液技术：ZEUS X1 Hamilton 是全球领先的精密测量设备、自动化液体处理工作站和样品管理系统制造商，很高兴地宣布发布其最新创新产品 ZEUS X1。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Hamilton-unveils-next- Generation-of-air-displacement-pipetting-technology-ZEUS-X1.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Hamilton-unveils-next- Generation-of-air-displacement-pipetting-technology-ZEUS-X1.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8bd26bf-9c6d-4676-8d57-bde024bcc787 Tue, 21 May 2024 01:01:00 -0400 Hamilton unveils next generation of air displacement pipetting technology: ZEUS X1
CLK激酶抑制剂1C8和GPS167对癌细胞增殖和转移的影响2024 年 5 月 16 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“通过对上皮-间质转化和抗病毒免疫反应的影响揭示了 CLK 激酶抑制剂 1C8 和 GPS167 的抗癌潜力”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Impact-of-CLK-kinase-inhibitors-1C8-and-GPS167-on-cancer-cell-proliferation-and-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Impact-of-CLK-kinase-inhibitors-1C8-and-GPS167-on-cancer-cell-proliferation-and-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=621eb8b5-7d90-48af-aee9-dd58098f52ac Mon, 20 May 2024 23:52:57 -0400 Impact of CLK kinase inhibitors 1C8 and GPS167 on cancer cell proliferation and metastasis
多奈哌齐未能增强乳腺癌幸存者的认知能力：III 期试验结果许多乳腺癌幸存者报告化疗后出现与癌症相关的认知障碍，尽管患病率和严重程度各不相同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Donepezil-fails-to-enhance-cognitive-bility-in-breast-cancer-survivors-Phase-III-Trial-results-To-Test-Wether- A-痴呆-D.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Donepezil-fails-to-enhance-cognitive-bility-in-breast-cancer-survivors-Phase-III-Trial-results-To-Test-Wether- A-痴呆-D.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a262898-287a-44a0-9596-11a9b73704d1 Mon, 20 May 2024 23:49:00 -0400 Donepezil fails to enhance cognitive abilities in breast cancer survivors: Phase III trial results
